data.text: @EU_Commission @BorisJohnson @potus yet again your complacency has led to the murder of civilians by a vicious army. Bodies in the streets of Bucha are undeniable #WarCrimes. Putin and his army must be brought to justice; there can be no ties or business with Russia now.
@EU_Commission You need to deal with Hungary and that reactionary Mr Orban now! You have let him away with his fascist politics for far too long!!

@EU_Commission I have 2 children, I have to think about life, and I want to go to Russia and erode the whole Russian nation.  I hate everything Russian, make sure that the Ukrainian people do not hate you for inaction.

@EU_Commission now there is no place for tolerance and fear, now we need to gather all the forces of the world, to order the Nazis so that they are afraid to even think about war.  How much evil has this country brought to this world?

@EU_Commission 
#UkraineWar
#Russia 
#DeminishingDeprndencyRussianOil
#EU suggesting lowering max speed limits European motorways. German motorway max speed limit.
@EU_Commission Europe is not silent about why Germany and Hungary are behaving remotely, why they think it does not concern them, you must help everyone to destroy this fascist army of Russia.
@EU_Commission Will you investigate the Hungarian cheated and faked elections?
@EU_Commission Don’t you see that all these sanctions will turn against the European economy and destabilize the whole Union?  Wake up please !

@EU_Commission Europe, USA, what else needs to happen for you to intervene and stop the genocide in Ukraine?  When the rockets start to fall in your cities it will be too late.  I beg you save the Ukrainian people!
@EU_Commission 🇺🇦💙💛 #StandWithUkraine

@EU_Commission 
🇹🇯🇹🇯👏👏👏
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Z

@EU_Commission 

Dnipro is crucial for Ukraine's survival.

We MUST protect Dnipro from the russian troops.

Give military aid towards Ukraine and reforce Dnipro againest the russian aggresor.

@EU_Commission An investigation into the civilians killed on the street in Bucha would be really needed. With all due respect to the victims and my personal contempt for war, there may be suspicions: better investigate if possible.

@EU_Commission Ukraine should remove Zelensky from Ukraine as President. Ukraine should not start biological laboratories in Ukraine and shut down nuclear plant started in Ukraine. Why NATO offered membership to Ukraine. @CNN @AJEnglish @POTUS @BBCWorld 
@KremlinRussia_E @GovernmentRF @SkyNews

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Maybe it would be better if @JustinTrudeau would not be there. 
I cannot take this pledge seriously if these kind of #WEF rulers are attending. Putin has blood on his hands, but @JustinTrudeau has dirty hands as well. Same for all the other #WEF rulers such as @vonderleyen.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Hi , I'm here looking for some youtuber to do promoting about my platform or someone that have the good marketing ability and interested to do business :pp：+447859356625
telegram：@Nora7783

@EU_Commission A lot of fake news in this video. 
What is the relation between the fashion industry and trash in the ocean? If people and countries would manage their trash properly this would not be a problem.

@EU_Commission MERKEL is responsible for genocide in Ukraine, she is the same terrorist as Putin and his army

@EU_Commission  how the World imagines stopping when it is unable to stop pro-Russian idiots in Europe,like #Dodik, #Covic, #Vucic, #Milanovic, #Orban. Mass rallies in support of Russian aggression are still being held in Serbia, 50km  from EU, why EU supports nationalists?!?
@EU_Commission Stand up against the EU

@EU_Commission J. Kaczyński drives Poland into economic troubles. This irresponsible man, guided by the rnst for the unproven catastrophe in which his brother died, wants revenge on Putin. He is doing it at the expense of Poles

@EU_Commission ucraini in condizioni di mostrare le immagini dei cadaveri perché più bravi e organizzati oppure dell'altre il milione di cadaveri provocato dalle aggressioni in Iraq gli USA hanno proibito filmarli e fotografarli? Tanta indignazione oggi tanta indifferenza ieri

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn You have been witnessing a Terrible Incredible Genocide Extermination of Ukraine for more than a month!!!! Incredible it happened in 2022, unbelievable NONE OF YOU POWERFUL has immediately stopped it all!!!!! And keep NOT stopping it!!!! What are you waiting for?!?!!! 🇺🇦😰😨🤬🇺🇦

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau The Russian-Ukrainian War, Britain and the United States are profiting, what does Europe get? refugee? Energy and food prices are rising? European leaders focus only on Ukraine and ignore Europe's plight!
@EU_Commission Hay que intervenir ya en Ucrania sin miedos y sin tapujos mandando armas potentes. Y hay que decretar el fin del comercio con Rusia
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn EU is breaking apart. It´s over.
@EU_Commission Horrified by what is seen. BUT THE WAR COULD HAVE BEEN PREVENTED!!!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @EUCouncil @eucopresident @EP_President @Palazzo_Chigi @ItalyMFA_int @EmmanuelMacron @Bundeskanzler @JoeBiden @POTUS @BorisJohnson
Two things to do NOW:
• stop ALL import from Russia #EmbargoRussianOilAndGas
• cut off ALL Russian banks from #SWIFT

@EU_Commission La popolazione del pianeta è di circa 8miliardi. La popolazione del mondo occidentale ammonta a 906milioni circa. Russia, Cina, India, Pakistan, Nord Corea, hanno armi atomiche e non sono più disposti.a subire la arroganza criminali è le menzogne dell'occidente.

@EU_Commission Zelensky was lured into a trap of getting included inside NATO little knowing that one day this very US/NATO will not get themselves involved militarily if Ukraine is attacked by Russia. What was Ukraine's fault ? It only wanted to be a part of NATO. Is it a crime?

@EU_Commission Step by step Russia is turning Ukraine into a mass graveyard and you are looking on helplessly. A small beautiful country is being destroyed systematically by Russia. The people of Ukraine should suffer the effects of World War 3 but Europe should keep itself safe.
@EU_Commission Why are you still paying Putin to butcher Ukrainians?
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn when Ukraine join EU, what is waiting for? why still afraid Russia? Russia showing their weakness

@EU_Commission @EU_Commission   Walk the talk. Stop buying energy from Russia. Send arms to Ukraine. Enforce no fly zone and so on. Confiscate oligark properties. Cut Russia Banks from SWIFT. Taken your thumb out of your ass and get shit done!

@EU_Commission After what you saw in Bucha, Irpen and Gostomel, buying Russian oil and gas is like buying human fat soap and leather lampshades from the Reich in 1943.

The scale is different, but the essence is the same.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau After what you saw in Bucha, Irpen and Gostomel, buying Russian oil and gas is like buying human fat soap and leather lampshades from the Reich in 1943.

The scale is different, but the essence is the same.
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Are we waiting even more horrible news from Ukrain? Stop all trade whit Russia!

@EU_Commission Bucha streets filled with dead bodies of civilians killed by Russians, tortured, shot by Russians, raped women, girls.I don’t understand how the West, 🇮🇳 🇨🇳 can still do business with Russia. It’s like doing business with Hitler if he were alive. World keeps watching the killings
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn 💙💛

@EU_Commission We #StandUpForPalestine
We #StandUpForYemen🇾🇪

@EU_Commission It's the moment to stop acting as moraly superior and walk the talk: saying Russia is bad while trading with it is moraly bankrupt.  In a trial, people that facilitate a crime are complicit: that's really what EU is: guilty of war crimes by association.  Total trade embargo now!
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Stand up for Ukraine

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Stop trade with Russia: accept to share Ukraine's burden at least economically and enact truly damaging sanctions or you are complicit.  Total trade embargo, including oil and gas, stop the massacre!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @eucopresident We are in such a bad position. We tell China and other states not to hinder the western sanctions against Russia but still we need and buy also oil, gas and other Russian resources. We are so implausible 😭😭

@EU_Commission And that will be the end of the fashion industry as they exist purely on a seasonal shift to sell clothing. 
So what solution do you have for the industry itself?

@EU_Commission #Bucha #StopRussia #BuchaMassacre

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn And what do we do for all those other Ukrainians who are taken away to Russia, who are raped, who no longer have a home, their children murdered???  Pathetic mess is NATO and the EU. @NATO @coe @eu #skillsprofiletool @vonderleyen @EmmanuelMacron @MinPres @POTUS
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn #Bucha
@EU_Commission There is a war in Uganda....only that EU decided to keep a deaf hear! We need actions  and m7 is not the president! Stop dealing with m7,m7 and his family are killing Ugandans

@EU_Commission All Dictators like @KagutaMuseveni must fall.That's the only way you can help the World 🌎.The outcome of keeping quiet is death of innocent people #ENDM7Dictatorship #KUNGA #DEFUNDM7 @UN @G7 @hrw @UN_HRC @RoyalFamily @UKParliament @IntlCrimCourt @usmissionuganda #MagnitskyActUG

@EU_Commission No https tho? Really?

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau #BuchaMassacre a page from the many bloody atrocities of Russia. We need more pressure to Russia IMMEDIATELY!
-Oil, gas, coal embargo
-Close all ports to Russian vessels and goods
-Disconnect all Russian banks from SWIFT
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Yeah I tell you something, Germany has lost any moral autority.
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn blah blah blah - it's unbearable, your chatter. FINALLY DOING THE RIGHT THING after Bucha at all. Their mendacious "actions" may help your conscience, but not Ukrainians.
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Really fucks? Look at the genocide in Guccha.

@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn #BuchaMassacre was deliberate. Russians aim to eliminate as many Ukrainians as they can. We demand new devastating G7 sanctions NOW:

-Oil, gas, coal embargo
-Close all ports to Russian vessels and goods
-Disconnect all Russian banks from SWIFT
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn Stop importing 🇷🇺 oil and gas instead of showing off with 🇪🇺 people's solidarity!!! You are endangering our future!

@EU_Commission For god sake, surely we are beyond saying things.  Do we really stand up for Ukraine? Then why are we still enriching Putin’s war machine by buying Russian O&G.  As long as we do that, we should stfu.
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn humanitarian aid is great but Ukraine needs more weapons #StandUpForUkraine
@EU_Commission @GlblCtzn @AndrzejDuda @vonderleyen @JustinTrudeau Pourquoi vous parlez anglais ? Je comprends pas il y aucun pays anglais en Europe...

@EU_Commission The horrifying photo-facts from the liberated Ukrainian cities of Bucha and Irpin show that crimes against humanity are happening right now. Russian troops in Ukraine are not only fighting the Af of Ukraine but also practicing torture,executions and even burningup civilians.
@EU_Commission Only the Baltic States have their act together.  They warned about Putin for years.  No one listened.  They have cut off Russian gas. I applaud them.

@EU_Commission Something does not add up. Standing up for Ukraine via humanitarian help? Like a grandma tending to her beaten up grandchild instead of stoping the bully?  Resurrected hitler stampeding Europe and west is only about humanitarian help? Is this kindness, naiveness, or foolishness?

@EU_Commission Please, stop just saying. We need actions. Decisive ones. Badly.
#BuchaMassacre is 100% is not a single case. We haven't seen lots of cities yet. 
Start acting.

#Stoprussia

@EU_Commission #StandUpForUkraine =
1. Give Ukrainians weapons to free the ENTIRE country from the invader,
2. Keep piling up sanctions on Russia,
NOW, not after the conflict is frozen, otherwise we - yet again! - will start all over again in a few years!!!
Act NOW, EU, NATO, USA!!!

@EU_Commission @vonderleyen @eucopresident Blablabla blabla

@EU_Commission Ukrainians are "guilty" only in the fact that they want to live in Ukraine,speak Ukrainian and choose their own government.According to Putin,for this they are subject to destruction,death,burial in mass graves. He is a war criminal that the whole world must fight.

@EU_Commission Jews. 4 years of the Holocaust. Lots of monuments, the whole world knows. Ukrainians: centuries of bans on language and culture, famines, shootings, and dozens, hundreds of such "Buch" = the world is silent, and will continue to be silent.
